body_html: I have pushed a change with < on the caret but it shows up in the dropdown when added to 'Past teams'. I replied to comment in review but may have got lost in thread, see here. How is it now?
body_text: I have pushed a change with < on the caret but it shows up in the dropdown when added to 'Past teams'. I replied to comment in review but may have got lost in thread, see here. How is it now?
body:
I have pushed a change with `<` on the caret but it shows up in the dropdown when added to 'Past teams'. I replied to comment in review but may have got lost in thread, see here. How is it now?

![screen shot 2017-12-14 at 10 26 28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/22551831/33994477-6244d2da-e0b9-11e7-8872-3ea7a5b9e53a.png)
